english.segment1: Here I am. I'm looking for a place to hide. Here's my soul. Broken and needing a home. I need You. Will You come in
english.segment2: I am Your cup. Come fill me with love. My heart's in Your hands. Its broken for You. Oh Lord
english.segment3: Here I am. I found a safe place to hide. In Your Arms. my soul has found a home. I love You. I'll let the whole world know
english.segment4: I am Your cup. Come fill me with love. My heart's in Your hands. Its broken for You. Oh Lord. Its broken for You. Oh Lord
english.segment5: With hands lifted High. I'll bless your name. With a hearts full of love. We will sing your grace
english.segment6: I am Your cup. Come fill me with love. My heart's in Your hands. Its broken for You. Oh Lord
english.segment7: I am Your cup. Come fill me with love. My heart's in Your hands. Its broken for You. Oh Lord. Its broken for You. Oh Lord. Its broken for You. Oh Lord
